direction.raw_text: Great. I'm going to have some freaky ass nightmares. INT. HOSPITAL ROOM - NIGHT Debbie walks into Pete's room, sits on the bed next to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I really liked our lives so much better before we tried to change everything. I'm sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I'm sorry. I don't want to keep anything from you. I love you. You're my wife. I just didn't want to let you down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you mad that I'm pregnant?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I'm not mad. I'm thrilled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't feel trapped?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sometimes I feel like I trapped you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't feel trapped.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You should, because I've trapped you. You can't go anywhere. I'm going to get you pregnant every ten years for the rest of your life. You can never leave me. Ever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I never feel trapped by you. I'm so happy to be with you. I love you so much. You're my favorite person in the whole world. god damn it, why am I crying like this? Something is wrong with me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're pregnant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yeah. Shit. I was just outside telling your dad that I liked him. What if he thinks I like him now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, he won't think that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't want him to think I like him that much.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It'll never happen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (suddenly giddy) Can you believe it? This is the craziest thing ever. What are we going to do with a third baby?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have no idea. How are we going to afford it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll sell the house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We don't have to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We kind of do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We kind of do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll make new memories in a new house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is there anything you want to do for your birthday? It's been the worst birthday ever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is one thing, but I don't think you'll like it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wouldn't mind going to see some music. Would you want to do that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really? I don't believe you, but you're sweet for saying that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do we break you out of here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can just leave on my own volition. It's not a mental institution.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not like One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest. Please don't put a pillow over my face. Debbie laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's get out of here, McMurphy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got it, Chief. Will you carry me? As Debbie helps Pete off of the hospital bed, Pete kisses her passionately. INT. SMALL NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT Pete and Debbie watch Ryan Adams perform "Lucky Now" with his band.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I like this song.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Why? Pete smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you sign him?
direction.name: direction
